8156.quoteText: We will never keep logs at any component of our infrastructure
8156.title: User logs are never stored at any component of infrastructure

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

8157.quoteText: <li>Your IP is anonymized at all times
8157.title: IP addresses of website visitors are anonymized

tosdr.case: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

8158.quoteText:
• Your information is legally protected by German laws. In Germany, gag orders do not exist. Should we ever receive a court order, we will do our best not to comply and publish every single one immediately on the Main_Page or a designated, from the Main_Page linked article. We will at any times promptly inform users targeted by law enforcement or any litigation.
  • We
8158.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible

tosdr.case: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible

8159.quoteText: <li>We will never sell nor share in any way any information about our users to anyone
8159.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

8183.quoteText:
Therefore, parts, or all, of the recorded user data may be used to segment users and derive, induce or deduce, behavioural classes and patterns, reflecting the interests and motivations of a user, that may be used to form meaningful target groups.
  • Using collected, anonymized data, we may develop features that take advantage of this and improve the user experience for everyone.
8183.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

tosdr.case: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

8184.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: privacy policy states "your IP is anonymized at all times" ; "We will never keep logs at any component of our infrastructure". total privacy is around 500 words long.
